Description.enUS:
Basic worker unit. Can gather resources, build Terran structures, and repair.

Can attack ground units.
Description.zhCN:
Basic worker unit. Can gather resources, build Terran structures, and repair.

Can attack ground units.
Description.koKR:
Basic worker unit. Can gather resources, build Terran structures, and repair.

Can attack ground units.

Tooltip.enUS: A list of basic structures.
Tooltip.zhCN: A list of basic structures.
Tooltip.koKR: A list of basic structures.

Tooltip.enUS: A list of advanced structures.
Tooltip.zhCN: A list of advanced structures.
Tooltip.koKR: A list of advanced structures.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders SCV to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.
Tooltip.zhCN: Orders SCV to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.
Tooltip.koKR: Orders SCV to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.

Tooltip.enUS: Returns the carried resources to the nearest drop-off point.
Tooltip.zhCN: Returns the carried resources to the nearest drop-off point.
Tooltip.koKR: Returns the carried resources to the nearest drop-off point.

Tooltip.enUS: Restores life to mechanical units and structures at the cost of resources.
Tooltip.zhCN: Restores life to mechanical units and structures at the cost of resources.
Tooltip.koKR: Restores life to mechanical units and structures at the cost of resources.

Tooltip.enUS:
Primary structure. Used to receive gathered resources. Can use the Lift Off ability and can build a Comsat Station or Nuclear Silo add-ons.

Enables:
- SCV

Primary structure. Used to receive gathered resources. Can use the Lift Off ability and can build a Comsat Station or Nuclear Silo add-ons.

Enables:

Tooltip.koKR:
